description:
NCERT Solutions for Class 9th Maths Term2 (SA2) is a self-paced course is designed to help CBSE/ NCERT students to understand concepts and application through videos. You can view these classes as many times as you want to clear the concepts. The comprehensive nature of this course will help you be prepared for CBSE board exams, competitive exams and in engineering entrance examinations.

NCERT Solutions for Class 9th Maths has particularly been created with the view to give students to explore mathematics and develop the abilities to reason mathematically.

Key Features:

  • Each question is explained with concepts.
  • Notes, Formulas, Definitions, Key points are included in the videos, while explaining each question.
  • While explaining each solutions, we have added small anecdotes, pictures which you would find interesting.

How to get most from this video course:

  • Schedule time and watch videos.
  • Take Notes as we solve each exercise.
  • We recommend you solve each question on your own before going through video explanation.
  • Practice NCERT solutions every day.
  • Teach it to someone (anyone).

Second Term: SA-II (October to March)


Units Topics Marks
1. Algebra
  • Linear equations in two variables.
 16
2. Geometry (Contd.)
  • Quadrilaterals.
  • Area.
  • Circles.
  • Constructions.
 38
3. Mensuration (Contd.)
  • Surface area & volumes
 18
4. Statistics and Probability
  • Statistics.
  • Probability.
 18
title: NCERT Solutions for Class 9th Maths Term 2 (SA2)
